attempts.raw_output:
The current codebase architecture already partially supports this: `ContainerInfo` (folders) inherits from `ConnectionInfo` and can have connection properties (Hostname, Protocol, etc.) assigned, which allows them to be connected to. However, the UI does not currently allow adding children to a `ConnectionInfo` node, nor does it easily expose connection properties for Folders in the same way as Connections (though they work if set). The feature request essentially asks to bridge this gap, either by allowing `ConnectionInfo` to have children or by improving the "Folder as Connection" experience (e.g., changing icons, "Convert to Folder" context menu).
